content:
Since FP-to-integer as cast are now well-defined, I've been looking at improving the code generation for these, and have submitted an LLVM patch for AArch64. With @Alex Crichton's recent PR, we get some decent (single-instruction) code generation for these conversions.
I'm mentioning it here to avoid duplicated effort; there seem to be more activity in this area than I first realised.
